meanings.definition: In a manner showing excessive enthusiasm or zeal
meanings.sent1: She cheered fanatically for her favorite team during the game.
meanings.sent2: He studied fanatically for his upcoming exam.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the laser pointer fanatically around the room.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed fanatically after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The children laughed fanatically at the clown's silly antics.

meanings.sent1: The artist painted fanatically late into the night to finish the masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: She cleaned fanatically to prepare for the visit of her in-laws.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail fanatically when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone fanatically on the field of wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: The students listened fanatically to the inspiring speech by their teacher.
